<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4046</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Plantations in Ireland -- Primary Sources</string>
            <string language="es">Establecimientos en Irlanda – Fuentes principales</string>
            <string language="ga">Plandálacha in Éirinn – Foinsí Príomha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Plantagen in Irland -- Primärquellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plantations en Irlande -- sources primaires</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Plantações em Ireland -- fontes preliminares</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Piantagioni in Irlanda -- sorgenti primarie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φυτείες στην Ιρλανδία -- αρχικές πηγές</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Visual and primary sources of information relating to the Plantations in Ireland with a range of challenging questions for students to complete.</string>
            <string language="es">Fuentes visuales y principales de información relacionada con los establecimientos en Irlanda con unas preguntas difíciles para que los estudiantes las respondan.</string>
            <string language="ga">Foinsí amhairc agus príomha eolais maidir le Plandálacha in Éirinn le réimse ceisteanna dúshlánacha don dalta.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">History</string>
            <string language="es">Historia. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Stair</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sicht- und Primärquellen der Informationen in 
bezug auf sind die Plantagen in Irland mit einer Strecke der 
schwierigen Fragen, damit Kursteilnehmer durchführen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sources visuelles et primaires d'information 
concernant les plantations en Irlande avec un intervalle des questions
provocantes pour que les étudiants terminent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fontes visuais e preliminares da informação que
relacionam-se às plantações em Ireland com uma escala de perguntas 
challenging para que os estudantes terminem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sorgenti visive e primarie delle informazioni 
concernente le piantagioni in Irlanda con una gamma di domande 
challenging affinchè allievi completino.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οπτικές και αρχικές πηγές πληροφοριών σχετικά με τις 
φυτείες στην Ιρλανδία με μια σειρά της πρόκλησης των ερωτήσεων 
για τους σπουδαστές για να ολοκληρώσει.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">History</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιστορία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
